title: Gust of Wind
tags: how to acquire gust of wind
content:
in, Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard Gust of Wind can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Tempest Domain, Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard

Gust of Wind Tips & Notes

Off Balance (Condition): Disadvantage on Strength/Dexterity Checks, and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage. Can be used to remove Cloudkill. ???

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Cold (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Fire (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromati
